entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 11:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
